metadata.title: CVE-2020-16248 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Prometheus Blackbox Exporter through 0.17.0 allows/probe?target= SSRF. NOTE: follow-on discussion suggests that this mightplausibly be interpreted as both intended functionality and also avulnerability.

criterions.comment: prometheus-blackbox-exporter package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
